org.dudss.nodeshot

Class Base

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dudss.nodeshot.Base

  • public class Base
extends java.lang.Object
    A static class that functions as of wrapper of some constant variables and utility methods.

        Recalculates a float value into a different number range.
        Parameters:
        OldValue - The original value.
        OldMin - The original lower limit of the number range.
        OldMax - The original higher limit of the number range.
        NewMin - The new lower limit of the number range.
        NewMax - The new higher limit of the number range.
